subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] Re: Nathan re: Hoax
author: bruce halliday

--_ccc0a760-314a-4223-9587-2a6908d1a5cc_
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="Windows-1252"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable


Nathan,
 
If you would have come to this board spewing this nonsense a cou=
ple of months ago, you would have seen a whole different side of me.
But my=
 friends both here and on the other side have educated me on how to be a be=
tter individual.
So I will leave it at this.
 
You have changed your opinio=
ns and doctrine 10 times here in the last three days, and had the gall to a=
sk that someone send you a box to experiment
with. we, or I should say I so=
 as not to speak for anyone else have seen the religious fanatical website =
you are associated with and I know kind of understand what drives you.
 
I =
actually would like to extend my sympathies, it is apparent that you have s=
ome issues to deal with, But in my personal opinion you are a disrupting in=
fluence on this group and should
consider membership in a group with like m=
inded individuals.
 
This is not meant to be an invitation to a pissing con=
test, It is an attempt to quell any negative vibrations that would disrupt =
our research. You have already accused a respected member of this group of =
perpetrating a hoax, and have insulted every researchers intelligence with =
your ideas about spiritual alien domination and enslavement and persecution=
 of human spirits on the other
side.
 
I have done long hard research in th=
is communication field and have had many opportunities to speak to my trust=
ed friends and family in the spirit realm. Not once have I ever gotten any =
indication
of the nonsense you are trying to sell here.
 
By your own admis=
sion, you have never experienced any box communication, so therefore your o=
pinion and doctrine is completely ignorant and unfounded in relation to thi=
s research.
 
My suggestion is to sit back and try to learn by reading what=
 we post about the research and not post anything here until you have a sem=
blance of an intelligent opinion.
which in my assumption will never occur.
=
 
Please do not disrupt our group any further.
 
Bruce Halliday
Bruce Halli=
day 


To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.comFrom: v1230mail@...: Mon, 14 Ap=
r 2008 02:19:58 +0000Subject: [EVP-ITC] Re: Nathan re: Hoax




WHY ARE YOU=
 CALLING ME A SKEPTIC? I GUESS YOU LIKE TO THROW AROUNDLABELS AT EVERY ONE =
WHO HAS A QUESTION OR DOUBT? GROW UP PLEASE.-- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, =
bruce halliday<paranormalinvestigating@...> wrote:>> > Nathan, > > I sugges=
t you read the headline and description of this group.> We are a group of r=
eal time communication researchers that are > continously seeking the truth=
. The founder of this board > Mr. Frank Sumption has alway's made it clear =
that It is not a place > for sceptics and they will not be tolerated. We ar=
e here to study and > further real time soirit communication, not have to d=
efend every post > we make or file we add. I suggest you take your negative=
 accusationsand > detrimental unfounded criticism and scepticism somewhere =
else. > > You are wearing your welcome thin here, not to mention within 5 p=
osts > you have contradicted yourself three times. and went from thephiloso=
phy > of aliens enslaving human spirits to questioning any chance thatthis =
method > of spirit communication could or does exist and is a conspiricy to=
fool unsuspecting> people like us by means of a super transmitter.> > I hav=
e learned by experience to try and keep this type of postcivil, So for any =
moderators that are reading this > Please review the situation.> > Bruce Ha=
lliday> Bruce Halliday > > > To: EVP-ITC@...: f1cracker75@...: Sat, 12 Apr =
2008 19:24:11-0700Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re:First SuCcessful Recordings - N=
athanre: Hoax> > > > > > Nathan, I am amazed you would suggest or even thin=
k that! I live inCary, North Carolina and record when I have the time. Ther=
e is no setschedule, and when I turn my radio on and someone says hello Mic=
hael,or even shouts out "Mike Edwards", or a spirit tells me I am holding a=
carving in my hand, who would even know I turned the radio on? Only mywife =
knows I record, and we have kept this research from our childrenas well as =
our neighbors. So you are suggesting that Margaret, letssay who lives where=
 I do not know, is playing a joke on me with a hightech two way radio?> > i=
tcdeadpeople <ITCdeadpeople@...> wrote:> > > Hi Nathan. I always look to re=
levance as a key in determiningwhether or not something is appropriate to t=
he session. If this were ahoax, I would then have to seek an explanation fo=
r how privateinformation is known by the 'hoax perp', particularly informat=
ion thatwould require visual awareness. Some of us have examples ofappropri=
ate responses being given when asking things like, "Can youname something n=
earby me?" or "Please tell me what I'm holding in myleft hand." A sophistic=
ated multi-transmission two way radio would notexplain answers which requir=
e 'visual' information of some kind(though I'll be the first to admit my un=
derstanding of electronics islimited but I'm fairly confident on this aspec=
t.) Of course, there isalways the chance that the person running the hoax i=
s also, or inpartnership with, an extremely talented remote viewer or psych=
ic whois able to glean that visual information from the ether or the mind o=
fthe experimenter. And what of those examples where people haveconfirmed th=
e sound of the voice being "just like" that of their lovedone in spirit? Su=
rely the hoaxer isn't also able to mimic people'sloved ones.If you are usin=
g EVP Maker with anything other than theallophones file, which contains no =
words to begin with, you are alsorunning the possibility of 'false positive=
s' albeit they wouldn't befrom a hoax. Again, I look to relevance to be key=
, and relevant infothat would not come easily to a stranger is even better.=
 For example,I turned on my MiniBox for the very first time and said, "Hell=
o?" andimmediately received the response, "Hello Margaret." If this were ah=
oax, how could that person know in less than 10 seconds, who I was byname. =
I had not given this information out. Not to mention that youhave people ex=
perimenting 24/7 and receiving similar responses. How inthe world could an =
organization have the manpower, technology, or eventhe desire, to attempt s=
uch a hoax? I mean that as a genuine inquiry,because there might be an expl=
anation I have not thought of. I haveone example where, via radio sweep, my=
 communicator was able tocorrectly identify the status and location of a mi=
ssing person (who itturns out was alive and well, so we ended up with confi=
rmation thatthe info given had indeed been correct - which is much lesscomp=
licated that trying to track and understand the clues whenassociated with t=
he dead, or missing but not found.) Again, if a hoax,would that have simply=
 been a lucky guess on the part of thehoaxer?Bottom line for me is ... have=
 I wondered if it could be ahoax? Or simply a fortuitous tuning of the dial=
? Yes, on bothaccounts. But there is enough compelling evidence to rule out=
 both ofthem as an explanation for the far too many relevant examples recei=
vedby so many of us.Good food for thought, but after digesting it, I'dhave =
to say, "No, a sophisticated hoax does not sufficiently explainthe phenomen=
a on a large scale."Margaret--- InEVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, Nathan Sharman <=
v1230mail@> wrote:>> Has itever occurred to you, that some one or> organisa=
tion, could be using aradio to say the things> you heard?> > This whole rad=
io and spiritvoices, could be a MASSIVE> HOAX, perpetuated by some one with=
 asophisticated> multi-transmission two way radio.> > Think about it.> >THA=
T IS WHY I USE EVPmaker only to commuincate with> the otherdimension.> > __=

Nathan,<BR>
 <BR>
If you would have come to this board spe=
wing this nonsense a couple of months ago, you would have seen a whole diff=
erent side of me.<BR>
But my friends both here and on the other side have e=
ducated me on how to be a better individual.<BR>
So I will leave it at this=
.<BR>
 <BR>
You have changed your opinions and doctrine 10 times here =
in the last three days, and had the gall to ask that someone send you a box=
 to experiment<BR>
with. we, or I should say I so as not to speak for anyon=
e else have seen the religious fanatical website you are associated with an=
d I know kind of understand what drives you.<BR>
 <BR>
I actually woul=
d like to extend my sympathies, it is apparent that you have some issues to=
 deal with, But in my personal opinion you are a disrupting influence on th=
is group and should<BR>
consider membership in a group with like minded ind=
ividuals.<BR>
 <BR>
This is not meant to be an invitation to a pissing=
 contest, It is an attempt to quell any negative vibrations that would disr=
upt our research. You have already accused a respected member of this group=
 of perpetrating a hoax, and have insulted every researchers intelligence w=
ith your ideas about spiritual alien domination and enslavement and persecu=
tion of human spirits on the other<BR>
side.<BR>
 <BR>
I have done lon=
g hard research in this communication field and have had many opportunities=
 to speak to my trusted friends and family in the spirit realm. Not once ha=
ve I ever gotten any indication<BR>
of the nonsense you are trying to sell =
here.<BR>
 <BR>
By your own admission, you have never experienced any =
box communication, so therefore your opinion and doctrine is completely ign=
orant and unfounded in relation to this research.<BR>
 <BR>
My suggest=
ion is to sit back and try to learn by reading what we post about the resea=
rch and not post anything here until you have a semblance of an intelligent=
 opinion.<BR>
which in my assumption will never occur.<BR>
 <BR>
Pleas=
e do not disrupt our group any further.<BR>
 <BR>
Bruce Halliday<BR><B=
R><BR>
